snippet: Francis J. Greenburger, a real estate developer and manager, wants to open a treatment center for convicts that will provide an alternative to incarceration.
abstract: The Appraisal column; Francis J Greenburger, New York City real estate developer, discusses plans to open Greenburger Center for Social and Criminal Justice, 25-bed facility offering alternative to incarceration for mentally ill in New York metropolitan area; Greenburger's interest in his latest commercial real estate project grew from his experience with mentally ill son, now serving five-year prison sentence for arson.
lead_paragraph: Francis J. Greenburger, a real estate developer and manager, wants to open a treatment center for convicts that will provide an alternative to incarceration.
